about_the_game:
Pixel Puzzles Musical, listen to your favorite bands as you puzzle.

This release brings the atmospheric rock music of HCK9 to Pixel Puzzles.

HCK9 aka Half Cut K9 are a UK Alt Rock project written and fronted by northerner James Brown. HCK9 create their own blend of electronic and alternative genres, weaving them together to create a cinematic, sci fi experience with an enraged emo twist. Inspiration can be found from the likes of Placebo, Nine Inch Nails and Twenty One Pilots. While these "for fans of" references may apply, HCK9 execute everything in their very own special style, inspired by the toxically dystopian nature of our lives. The veracious lyrics and electrifying vocals are cleverly combined with a heavy yet modern production that will either make you want to save the world or end it.

HCK9 previous from this release have earned Radio airplay from BBC Radio 1, Radio X, Amazing Radio and others and DSP support including Spotify “All New Rock” and “not just a phase”, Apple Music “New In Rock” and Amazon Music “Breakthrough Rock”, “Fresh Rock”, “Best New Bands” and “Brand New Music”. They also gained sync with ITV's 'Love Island', BBC's 'Strictly Come Dancing' and the ‘Beatstar’ mobile game app. The band have also featured at 2022's Madcool Festival and 2023's The Great Escape as well as securing multiple support slots.

PACK INFO:

Music Tracks: 5
Puzzle Count: 11
Total Piece Count: 1782

TRACKS:

  • Track 1 - Insomnia feat. PEAKS!
  • Track 2 - Tell Me It Gets Better
  • Track 3 - Arcade
  • Track 4 - Medicine
  • Track 5 - Full Metal Jacket

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Puzzle 1 -

  • Puzzle 4 -
  • Puzzle 5 -
